harvester.CHARGES_HINT: If this item will be cast using charges from the parent item, configure the number of charges above.
harvester.LIMITED_HINT: If this item has a number of uses per rest or similar innate limitations, configure the number of charges above.
harvester.MISSING_ITEM_DESCRIPTION: This item's original item could not be found. Maybe it was deleted?
harvester.QUERY_ALSO_DELETE: Would you also like to delete the items from that item?
harvester.SAVE_HINT: If this item has a flat DC or other specialized saving throw logic.
harvester.SETTINGS.ITEM_EXCLUSION.HINT: Select which item types can have items attached.
harvester.SETTINGS.ITEM_EXCLUSION.NAME: Select Item Types
harvester.SETTINGS.ITEM_EXCLUSION.TITLE: Item Type Exclusion Menu
harvester.SETTINGS.SORT_ORDER.HINT: If checked, itembook sections added by this module will be put at the bottom of the itembook tab, rather than the top.
harvester.SETTINGS.SORT_ORDER.NAME: itembook Sort Order
harvester.item_LEVEL_HINT: If this item is to be cast at a specific level, configure the level above.
harvester.WARN_ALSO_DELETE: This will delete the harvester link item from the current item. Are you certain you want to delete the harvester link item?
harvester.WARN_CANNOT_ADDREMOVE: An Owned Item's items cannot be added to or removed from. These items have been added to the Actor's itembook Tab.
harvester.WARN_OWNED: You are editing an owned Item's items, any changes made here will not be applied to the items on the owning actor.
harvester.tab.label: Harvester Link
harvester.dialog.warning.areyousuretoadd: Are you sure you want to add the object ?
The object (usually a gem) will be destroyed when the operation is completed, so be careful adventurer.
